remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 中已经存在与添加的权限具有相同类型的权限，则新权限是现有权限对象和指定权限对象的并集。If a permission of the same type as the added permission already exists in the , the new permission is the union of the existing permission object and the specified permission object. 例如，如果将实现 的权限添加到 ，则生成的联合为原始 `Unrestricted`。For example, if a permission that implements is added to an , the resulting union is the original `Unrestricted`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法向权限集添加权限。The following code example shows the use of the method to add a permission to a permission set. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. abstract member Assert : unit -> unit override this.Assert : unit -> unit

summary.span: 声明调用代码能够通过调用此方法的代码，访问受权限请求保护的资源，即使未对堆栈中处于较高位置的调用方授予访问该资源的权限。

span.span: Declares that the calling code can access the resource protected by a permission demand through the code that calls this method, even if callers higher in the stack have not been granted permission to access the resource.

summary.span: 使用 会产生安全漏洞。

span.span: Using can create security vulnerabilities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是一种在一个帧中同时断言多个权限的唯一方法，因为在一个帧上只有一个 可以处于活动状态。This is the only way to assert multiple permissions at the same time within a frame because only one can be active on a frame. 仅对授予的权限有效。 is only effective for granted permissions. 调用 或 方法取消活动 。Call the or method to cancel an active . > [!CAUTION] > 由于调用 方法将消除调用链中的所有代码都必须被授予访问指定资源的权限的要求，因此，如果使用不当或不当，则可能会打开安全漏洞。Because calling the method removes the requirement that all code in the call chain must be granted permission to access the specified resource, it can open up security vulnerabilities if used incorrectly or inappropriately. 因此，使用它时要格外小心。Therefore, it should be used with great caution.

exception.span: 尚未向断言的 实例授予断言代码。

span.span: The instance asserted has not been granted to the asserting code.
-or-

exception.span: 已存在一个用于当前帧的活动的 。

span.span: There is already an active for the current frame.
Using the Assert Method

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Demand() cil managed
abstract member Demand : unit -> unit override this.Demand : unit -> unit

summary.span: 如果未对调用堆栈中所有较高级的调用方授予当前实例所指定的权限，则在运行时强制 。

span.span: Forces a at run time if all callers higher in the call stack have not been granted the permissions specified by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对 使用 ，以确保所有调用方都具有一项操作的所有权限。Use on a to ensure that all callers have all permissions in the set with one operation. 不检查调用此方法的代码的权限;该检查从该代码的直接调用方开始，并沿堆栈向上进行。The permissions of the code that calls this method are not examined; the check begins from the immediate caller of that code and proceeds up the stack. 调用堆栈通常表示为向下增长，因此调用堆栈中较高位置的方法调用堆栈中较低的调用方法。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack. 仅当未引发 时， 才会成功。 succeeds only if no is thrown. 如果 包含不从 继承的权限，则也会调用这些权限的 `Demand` 方法。If the contains permissions that do not inherit from , the `Demand` methods of those permissions are called as well. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法请求权限集中的所有权限。The following code example shows the use of the method to demand all the permissions in a permission set. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.PermissionSet#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.PermissionSet/CPP/permissionset.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.PermissionSet#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.PermissionSet/CS/permissionset.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.PermissionSet#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.PermissionSet/VB/permissionset.vb#4)]

exception.span: 调用链中的调用方没有所需的权限。

span.span: A caller in the call chain does not have the permission demanded.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Deny is obsolete and will be removed in a future release of the .NET Framework. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=155570 for more information.")

summary.span: 导致通过与当前 中所含类型的权限具有交集的权限的调用代码的任何 失败。

span.span: Causes any that passes through the calling code for a permission that has an intersection with a permission of a type contained in the current to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法阻止调用堆栈中较高位置的调用方通过调用此方法的代码访问受保护的资源，即使这些调用方已被授予访问该方法的权限。This method prevents callers higher in the call stack from accessing the protected resource through the code that calls this method, even if those callers have been granted permission to access it. 调用堆栈通常表示为向下增长，因此调用堆栈中较高位置的方法调用堆栈中较低的调用方法。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack. 可以限制程序员的责任，或帮助防止意外的安全漏洞，因为这样有助于防止调用 的方法访问由拒绝的权限保护的资源。 can limit the liability of the programmer or help prevent accidental security vulnerabilities because it helps prevent the method that calls from being used to access the resource protected by the denied permission. 如果方法对某个权限调用 ，并且调用堆栈中的调用方调用了该权限的 ，则该权限在到达 时将失败。If a method calls on a permission, and if a for that permission is invoked by a caller lower in the call stack, that security check fails when it reaches the . 对于未授予的权限，将忽略 ，因为对该权限的请求不会成功。 is ignored for a permission that is not granted because a demand for that permission cannot succeed.

exception.span: 对 的前一次调用已经限制当前堆栈帧的权限。

span.span: A previous call to has already restricted the permissions for the current stack frame.

param.name: other
param.span: 与当前的 相交的权限集。

summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限集，此权限集为当前的 和指定 的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission set that is the intersection of the current and the specified .

returns.span: 一个新权限集，它表示当前 与指定目标的交集。

span.span: A new permission set that represents the intersection of the current and the specified target.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此对象为 。

span.span: This object is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限集的交集是描述它们共同描述的一组操作的权限集。The intersection of two permission sets is a permission set that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 具体而言，它表示最小的权限，以使同时传递两个权限集的任何需求也会传递其交集。Specifically, it represents the minimum permissions such that any demand that passes both permission sets also passes their intersection. 对于这两个集中都存在的每种类型的权限，这些权限的两个实例使用权限的 `Intersect` 方法进行交叉。生成的权限包括在生成的 中。For each type of permission that is present in both sets, the two instances of those permissions are intersected using the permission's `Intersect` method; the resulting permission is included in the resulting . 仅存在于这两个集中之一的权限类型从结果集中排除。Permission types that exist in only one of the two sets are excluded from the resulting set. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 可以为空，并且还可以包含权限的实例（如果这些权限处于完全限制状态）。A can be empty and yet contain instances of permissions if those permissions are in the fully-restricted state. 如果权限作为参数传递 `null` 时，其 `IsSubsetOf` 方法返回 `true`，则权限处于完全限制状态。Permissions are in a fully restricted state if their `IsSubsetOf` methods return `true` when `null` is passed as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是目标 的一个子集，如果对该 的所有成功请求也可成功实现目标。A is a subset of the target if all demands that succeed for the also succeed for the target. 也就是说，目标至少包含子集中包含的权限。That is, the target contains at least the permissions contained in the subset. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. abstract member PermitOnly : unit -> unit override this.PermitOnly : unit -> unit

summary.span: 导致所有经过调用代码以请求不是当前 的子集的任何 的 失败。

span.span: Causes any that passes through the calling code for any that is not a subset of the current to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类似于 ，因为在这两个情况下，堆栈遍历将会失败。 is similar to , in that both cause stack walks to fail when they would otherwise succeed. 不同之处在于 指定将导致堆栈遍历失败的权限，但 指定不会导致堆栈遍历失败的唯一权限。The difference is that specifies permissions that will cause the stack walk to fail, but specifies the only permissions that do not cause the stack walk to fail. 调用此方法以确保你的代码只能用于访问指定的资源。Call this method to ensure that your code can be used to access only the specified resources. 对于未授予的权限，将忽略 ，因为对该权限的请求不会成功。 is ignored for a permission not granted because a demand for that permission cannot succeed. 但是，如果调用堆栈上的代码越小，稍后将对该权限调用 ，当堆栈遍历到达尝试调用 的代码时，将引发 。However, if code lower on the call stack later calls for that permission, a is thrown when the stack walk reaches the code that tried to call . 这是因为未授予调用 的代码的权限，即使该代码为该权限调用了 。This is because the code that called has not been granted the permission, even though it called for that permission. 调用堆栈通常表示为向下增长，因此调用堆栈中较高位置的方法调用堆栈中较低的调用方法。The call stack is typically represented as growing down, so that methods higher in the call stack call methods lower in the call stack.

returns.span: 从集中删除了的权限。

span.span: The permission removed from the set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 不能删除无限制权限集中的权限。You cannot remove permissions from an unrestricted permission set. 尝试删除权限后，权限集保持不受限制，并且不会引发异常。The permission set remains unrestricted after you attempt to remove the permission, and an exception is not thrown. 下面C#的代码尝试从 `FullTrust` 权限集中删除 ，但不删除权限。The following C# code attempts to remove the from the `FullTrust` permission set, but the permission is not removed. ``` PolicyLevel myPol = PolicyLevel.CreateAppDomainLevel(); PermissionSet myPermSet = myPol.GetNamedPermissionSet("FullTrust"); myPermSet.RemovePermission(typeof(FileIOPermission)); ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法从权限集中移除 。The following code example shows the use of the method to remove a from a permission set. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 的结果是一个 ，它表示当前 表示的所有操作，以及由指定的 表示的所有操作。The result of a call to is a that represents all the operations represented by the current as well as all the operations represented by the specified . 如果这两个集合 `Unrestricted`，则也会 `Unrestricted` 联合。If either set is `Unrestricted`, the union is `Unrestricted` as well. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example shows the use of the method. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
